metadata.name: GAUTAM BUDDHA
metadata.description: Buddha the divine almighty has been a great influence in my life. The principle of middle path to think and work in the present is one of the greatest assets of life., to believe and better the present and keep pursuing our passions and dreams in our life. The simplicity in our thoughts will make us more focused in our life and keep our visions of our goal more clear.This work is done in oil pastels and then animated in after effects.The music is also created by me
